com.soa.message.handler
Interface MessageFaultCode

public interface MessageFaultCode

Lists general message fault error codes and error messages that are returned to clients.

Field Summary
static javax.xml.namespace.QName INTERNAL_ERROR
          Standard fault code QName for an internal error.
static java.lang.String INTERNAL_ERROR_MESSAGE
          Error message for the internal error fault code.
static javax.xml.namespace.QName UNSPECIFIED_MESSAGE_REJECTION
          Standard fault code QName for an unspecified message rejection, maybe caused by a private policy enforcement failure .
static java.lang.String UNSPECIFIED_MESSAGE_REJECTION_MESSAGE
          Error message for the unspecified message rejection fault code.
